## InsertionMarkerPreviewer class

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class InsertionMarkerPreviewer implements IConnectionPreviewer 
```
**Implements:** [IConnectionPreviewer](./blockly.iconnectionpreviewer.md)

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.insertionmarkerpreviewer.dispose.md) |  | Dispose of any references held by this connection previewer. |
|  [hidePreview()](./blockly.insertionmarkerpreviewer.hidepreview.md) |  | Hide any previews that are currently displayed. |
|  [previewConnection(draggedConn, staticConn)](./blockly.insertionmarkerpreviewer.previewconnection.md) |  | Display a connection preview where the draggedCon connects to the staticCon, and no block is being relaced. |
|  [previewReplacement(draggedConn, staticConn, replacedBlock)](./blockly.insertionmarkerpreviewer.previewreplacement.md) |  | Display a connection preview where the draggedCon connects to the staticCon, replacing the replacedBlock (currently connected to the staticCon). |
